implement these features allowed for any guest user
use redis cache just in case of many user requests and cache html content, use a separate redis container for this purpose

- route: /[tenant_slug]
  - list all the available categories and subcategories  so users can click on them to navigate category pages
  - parent categories are linking to /[tenant_slug]/[tenants_category]
  - subcategories are linking to /[tenant_slug]/[tenants_category]/[tenants_subcategory]
